============
Base Classes
============

.. default-domain:: graphalchemy.basemodel

All Node and Edge classes are subclasses of :py:class:`BaseNode` and :py:class:`BaseEdge`.

.. autoclass:: graphalchemy.basemodel.BaseNode
    :members:

.. autoclass:: graphalchemy.basemodel.BaseEdge
    :members:
